allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add: Implement file transfer functionality for mobile version

- Implement FileTransferService.UploadFileAsync and DownloadFileAsync
- Add file parsing and storage for Android/iOS in AppDataDirectory
- Add file send/receive handlers in ChatPage and ChatsListPage
- Add file message parsing in MessageViewModel
- Create UI components for displaying images, videos, and other files
- Add file type converters \(FileTypeToIconConverter, FileTypeToTextConverter\)
- Add permissions for Android \(AndroidManifest\) and iOS \(Info.plist\)
- Support all file types: images \(inline preview\), video, audio, documents
- Clean up old server files \(moved to ICYOU.Server.Linux\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add: Platform-specific file saving for mobile version

- Add SaveFileAndroid method using MediaStore API
  - Images saved to Pictures/ICYOU
  - Other files saved to Downloads/ICYOU
- Add SaveFileIOS method using UIKit
  - Images saved to Photos using UIImage.SaveToPhotosAlbum
  - Other files saved using UIDocumentPickerViewController
- Replace Share API with actual file saving functionality
- Add OnSaveFileTapped event handler for save buttons

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
